trans-unit.source: Defines constants that specify whether single or multiple item selections are supported by a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 定義常數，指定是否會將單一或多個選取的項目支援的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> properties together determine how users can select items in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>屬性在一起會決定使用者如何選取<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>中的項目</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A> is Single and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionUnit>, the user can select one cell at a time in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>是單一的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionUnit>，使用者可以選取在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>一次一個資料格</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionUnit></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: InExtended mode, select multiple items by holding down the SHIFT key to extend the selection from an anchor point or the CTRL key to individually select additional items.
trans-unit.target: InExtended 的模式中，選取多個項目，按住 SHIFT 鍵，延伸選取範圍的錨點或 CTRL 鍵，個別選取其他項目。

trans-unit.source: Multiple items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> can be selected at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 中的多個項目<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>可以同時選取。

trans-unit.source: Only one item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> can be selected at a time.
trans-unit.target: 中的只有一個項目<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>可以選取一次。
